                                      ReportStartLoc reportStartLoc,
                                      org.apache.poi.xssf.usermodel.XSSFSheet sheet)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Builds standard header for standard reports. (Can't get much more generic than that)
        Parameters:
        report - Any ANSI Standard report object
        reportStartLoc - Where in the sheet to put the report
        sheet - The sheet we're working with
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Something bad happened

      • makeBannerData

        public static void makeBannerData​(AbstractReport report,
                                  ReportHeaderCol headerCol,
                                  org.apache.poi.xssf.usermodel.XSSFRow row,
                                  java.lang.Integer colIndex,
                                  org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.CellStyle labelStyle,
                                  org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.CellStyle dataStyle)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates left/right side data for banner rows in an Excel-formatted report
        Parameters:
        report - Any ANSI report
        headerCol - The label/data definition
        row - Which row in the banner are we working with
        colIndex - Which column in the banner are we working with
        labelStyle - How to format the label
        dataStyle - How to format the data
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Something bad happened

      • makeRow

        Parameters:
        sheet - Sheet from which a row will be used, or to which a row will be added
        rowNum - Where in the sheet are we going to work
        Returns:
        Excel row to be populated

        Parameters:
        report - The report for which we're adding column headers
        reportStartLoc - The row/column into which we're placing header
